main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted on 17 February 1949 from Sandia Base, Albuquerque, New Mexico.
interesting points: The object was described as globular with a trailing blue tail,The color of the object was noted as orange-red,It was observed at an altitude of 10,000 to 15,000 feet,The sighting lasted for approximately 5 to 7 seconds,The observer, M/Sgt John P. Mitchell, compared the object's speed to that of a P-80 jet plane.
sighted object: one globular object with a blue tail
witness description: M/Sgt John P. Mitchell, formerly an anti-aircraft gunner
